assignments.description: Used as input for the Manage Account Addresses Subflows
assignments.name: Assign_True_To_Newly_Created_Account_Variable
assignments.label: Assign True To Newly Created Account Variable

assignments.description: Assignment of entered variable values in order to fill the business account
assignments.name: Assign_Values_To_New_Business_Account_variable
assignments.label: Assign Values To New Business Account variable

assignments.description: Assignment of entered variable values in order to fill the person account
assignments.name: Assign_Values_To_New_Person_Account_variable
assignments.label: Assign Values To New Person Account variable

decisions.description: Determine if the flow is entered via the new person account or new business account button in order to show the correct screen for input
decisions.name: PersonAccount_or_BusinessAccount
decisions.label: PersonAccount or BusinessAccount

Flow.description: Flow to use for data entry on account level with address and bank account creation to be synced to Wocas
Flow.label: Screen Flow - Create New Account

screens.description: Entry screen for Business Account information
screens.name: Business_Account_Information
screens.label: Business Account Information

validationRule.errorMessage: Let op! Het toevoegen van een accountnaam is verplicht.
Let op! De invoer in dit veld kan niet meer dan 50 tekens bevatten.
Let op! De invoer in dit veld kan niet meer dan 50 tekens bevatten.

screens.description: Entry screen for Person Account information
screens.name: Person_Account_Information
screens.label: Person Account Information

validationRule.errorMessage: Let op! Het invullen van de achternaam is verplicht.
Valideer of het opgegeven telefoonnummer goed is ingevuld.
validationRule.formulaExpression: OR( ISBLANK({!Phone.value}), AND( BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "+"), NOT(BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "+0")), REGEX({!Phone.value}, "^\\+?[1-9]{1}[0-9]*$") ), AND( OR( BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "080"), BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "090") ), OR( LEN({!Phone.value}) = 8, LEN({!Phone.value}) = 11 ), NOT(LEN({!Phone.value}) = 10) ), AND( BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "044"), LEN({!Phone.value}) >= 6, LEN({!Phone.value}) <= 14 ), AND( BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "0"), NOT( OR( BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "080"), BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "090"), BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "044") ) ), LEN({!Phone.value}) = 10 ), AND( BEGINS({!Phone.value}, "1"), OR( LEN({!Phone.value}) = 3, LEN({!Phone.value}) = 4, LEN({!Phone.value}) = 5, LEN({!Phone.value}) = 6 ) ), REGEX({!Phone.value}, "^[2-9]{1}[0-9]{2}[\\s.-]?[0-9]{3}[\\s.-]?[0-9]{4}$") )

validationRule.errorMessage: Let op! Het invullen van het e-mailadres is verplicht.

screens.description: Screen to show message that flow didn't receive an input value for business account or person account entry
screens.name: Screen_NoInputFoundMessage
screens.label: Screen_NoInputFoundMessage

fields.name: Txt_NoInputFoundMessage
fields.fieldText: Helaas, het systeem heeft geen informatie ontvangen om te weten welk soort account aangemaakt moet worden. Ga terug naar de account lijstweergave en probeer opnieuw een persoons Ã³f bedrijfsaccount aan te maken.

screens.description: Screen to show the success messsage and button to open the created record.
screens.name: Success_Message
screens.label: Success Message

fields.name: Txt_SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: Mooi werk, {!$User.FirstName}! Je hebt succesvol een nieuw account aangemaakt in Salesforce.

subflows.description: Subflow to enter the screen flow to guide the flow input values from different entry levels (new account versus existing account + possible extention to the case and contract level later on) and serve as input for the main manage account addresses subflow
subflows.name: Manage_Account_Addresses_for_Subflow_Input
subflows.label: Manage Account Addresses for Subflow Input
